org.apache.tamaya.spisupport

Interface ConfigValueEvaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfigValueEvaluator

    public interface ConfigValueEvaluator
    Component SPI which encapsulates the evaluation of a single or full rawvalue for a ConfigurationContext.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,PropertyValue> evaluateRawValues(ConfigurationContext context)
      Evaluates all property values from a ConfigurationContext.
      PropertyValue evaluteRawValue(String key, ConfigurationContext context)
      Evaluates single value using a ConfigurationContext.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluteRawValue

        PropertyValue evaluteRawValue(String key,
                              ConfigurationContext context)
        Evaluates single value using a ConfigurationContext.
        Parameters:
        key - the config key, not null.
        context - the context, not null.
        Returns:
        the value, or null.

      • evaluateRawValues

        Map<String,PropertyValue> evaluateRawValues(ConfigurationContext context)
        Evaluates all property values from a ConfigurationContext.
        Parameters:
        context - the context, not null.
        Returns:
        the value, or null.
